item.title: ScoutCam Inc S-1
item.description: ScoutCam Inc, which is in the Optical Instruments & Lenses [3827] industry, SEC S-1 filing on May 04, 2021 had 30346 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 440 instances stock - 416 instances common - 345 instances shares - 322 instances may - 294 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
